SENT.plain: A case of an 18-year-old female, who developed an intraventricular hemorrhage and recurrent cerebral ischemic r attacks with Moyamoya like angiographical findings was reported
Lupus Anticoagulant (LA) was present in the patient's plasma
Cerebral angiography demonstrated stenosis and occlusion of the intracranial major arteries
Hemorrhagic episodes in patient's with LA is quite rare
The mechanism of intraventricular hemorrhage and the significance of LA in the differential diagnosis of Moyamoya disease are discussed
